criterion: Provides information on the importance of brushing teeth regularly
Correctly states the recommended frequency of brushing teeth (at least twice a day)
Does not recommend any specific toothpaste brand
Does not provide information on the importance of flossing
Correctly mentions the importance of fluoride toothpaste
Provides information on how to brush effectively (duration, coverage, and frequency)
Does not provide any specific information about brushing technique
Mentions that if you notice ongoing tooth sensitivity or signs of gum disease, you should schedule a check-up with your dentist
Does not provide any information about the consequences of poor oral hygiene
Provides information on the importance of regular dental check-ups
